SEARCH
Package com.example.lottary.ui.profile

Class ProfileInfoFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.lottary.ui.profile.ProfileInfoFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class ProfileInfoFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
A Fragment subclass that displays user information invalid input: '&' options to edit profile, delete profile and swap to Admin View (conditional)
See Also:
  • MyProfileActivity
  • EditProfileActivity
  • Outstanding Issues / Notes: Assigned admins are hard-coded and won't persist if the admin decides to change their device

    • populate

      private void populate(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot d)
      Put information from an user document on display on the appropriate fields. Will automatically return if document is empty
      Parameters:
      d - - a DocumentSnapshot containing user info to populate
      See Also:
      • FirestoreUserRepository

    • warnBeforeDelete

      private void warnBeforeDelete()
      Warn the user before allow them to delete the profile. Process deletion when the user confirm and dismiss the dialog when the user deny.
